summary: This is a Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General transcription request form for an audio interview of Jonathan Ormond conducted on October 13, 2021, related to case number 2019010614. The form includes approval signatures and cost details for the transcription service.

keyFacts: The document is a formal DOJ OIG request to transcribe a 1 hour 15 minute interview with Jonathan Ormond from October 13, 2021.
The interview is part of case number 2019010614, and the listed relevant names include Jeffrey Epstein and Tartaglione.
The transcription was approved and processed, with a final actual cost of $274.38.
